O

OBESITY_RESEARCH_FOLDER - Static variable in class cellularAutomata.rules.util.RuleFolderNames
Rules used in obesity research are placed in this folder.
OBESITY_TOUR_URL - Static variable in class cellularAutomata.CAConstants
The URL for a "Guided Tour" web page.
OBESITY_TUTORIAL - Static variable in class cellularAutomata.graphics.CAMenuBar
A string used for the "Obesity Tutorial" selection in the menu and also used to notify other classes that a "Obesity Tutorial" event has been fired.
ObesityModel - Class in cellularAutomata.rules
Rule for becoming obese based on your neighbors obesity.
ObesityModel(boolean) - Constructor for class cellularAutomata.rules.ObesityModel
Create the obesity rule using the given cellular automaton properties.
ObjectExample - Class in userRules
Finds the average of a cell and all of its neighbors.
ObjectExample(boolean) - Constructor for class userRules.ObjectExample
Create a rule that averages the values of neighboring cells.
objectRule(Object, Object[], int) - Method in class cellularAutomata.rules.ALifePi
Finds a new chromosome based on standard selection and genetic operations (crossover and mutation).
objectRule(Object, Object[], int) - Method in class userRules.ObjectExample
Finds the average value of a cell and all of its neighbors.
ObjectRuleTemplate - Class in cellularAutomata.rules.templates
A convenience class/template for any rules that need cell states based on an Object.
ObjectRuleTemplate(boolean) - Constructor for class cellularAutomata.rules.templates.ObjectRuleTemplate
Create a rule based on cells that use an Object for a state value.
ObjectState - Class in cellularAutomata.cellState.model
A cell state for a cellular automaton with arbitrary objects as states.
ObjectState(Object, Object, Object, Object) - Constructor for class cellularAutomata.cellState.model.ObjectState
Sets an Object as the initial state.
OneDimensionalFileStorage - Class in cellularAutomata.io
Writes a one-dimensional cellular automaton to a file.
OneDimensionalFileStorage() - Constructor for class cellularAutomata.io.OneDimensionalFileStorage
Creates a file where data will be stored.
OneDimensionalIntegerMargolusTemplate - Class in cellularAutomata.rules.templates
A convenience class/template for all rules that use the one-dimensional Margolus neighborhood with integer states.
OneDimensionalIntegerMargolusTemplate(boolean) - Constructor for class cellularAutomata.rules.templates.OneDimensionalIntegerMargolusTemplate
Create a rule using the given cellular automaton properties.
OneDimensionalLattice - Class in cellularAutomata.lattice
A one-dimensional lattice.
OneDimensionalLattice() - Constructor for class cellularAutomata.lattice.OneDimensionalLattice
Default constructor required of all Lattices (for reflection).
OneDimensionalLattice(String, Rule, int) - Constructor for class cellularAutomata.lattice.OneDimensionalLattice
Create a one-dimensional cellular automaton with the same rule at all positions.
OneDimensionalLattice(Cell[]) - Constructor for class cellularAutomata.lattice.OneDimensionalLattice
Create a one-dimensional lattice from the given cells.
OneDimensionalLattice(String, Rule) - Constructor for class cellularAutomata.lattice.OneDimensionalLattice
Create a one-dimensional cellular automaton with the same rule at all positions.
OneDimensionalLatticeView - Class in cellularAutomata.lattice.view
Creates the display area for a one-dimensional square-grid cellular automaton.
OneDimensionalLatticeView(OneDimensionalLattice) - Constructor for class cellularAutomata.lattice.view.OneDimensionalLatticeView
Creates a panel of the correct height and width.
OneDimensionalRealMargolusTemplate - Class in cellularAutomata.rules.templates
A convenience class/template for all rules that use the one-dimensional Margolus neighborhood with real-valued states.
OneDimensionalRealMargolusTemplate(double, double, boolean) - Constructor for class cellularAutomata.rules.templates.OneDimensionalRealMargolusTemplate
Create a rule using the given cellular automaton properties.
openSynthesizer() - Method in class cellularAutomata.util.music.MusicalInstrument
Request the default synthesizer (used to play music).
OUTER_TOTALISTIC_FOLDER - Static variable in class cellularAutomata.rules.util.RuleFolderNames
Outer totalistic rules are placed into the folder with this name.
OuterTotalistic - Class in cellularAutomata.rules
Creates an outer totalistic CA rule for a given lattice and rule "code".
OuterTotalistic(boolean) - Constructor for class cellularAutomata.rules.OuterTotalistic
Gets a number from the properties and sets up an appropriate cellular automaton rule based on that number.
